releaseNotes:
- Add Google Drive Cloud Backup & Restore.

- Add Sleep Timer to auto-pause music and many more...

- Team Netra

changelog.text: Add Google Drive Cloud Backup & Restore.
Add Sleep Timer to auto-pause music.
Add Global ErrorHandler for unified alerts.
Fix latest song notifications and improve overall music notification behavior.
Update Settings UI to show user profile, last backup time, and cloud options.

lockMessage: The app is temporarily locked for maintenance. Please check back later.
